description: When the chef Daniel Rose was growing up, his mother would make potato pancakes the first and the last three nights of Hanukkah These latkes are inspired by the French classic pommes Darphin, but the addition of onions puts them in a category all their own.
title: French Potato Pancakes
title_page: French Potato Pancakes Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
When the chef Daniel Rose was growing up, his mother would make potato pancakes the first and the last three nights of Hanukkah. These latkes are inspired by the French classic pommes Darphin, but the addition of onions puts them in a category all their own.
Featured in: A French Latke, As Big As The Pan.
